pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Extra Care Bio-Tech Hydrate Conditioner 500ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Powered by the science of nature, BIO-TECH HYDRATE CONDITIONER formulated with Olive Squalane & Hemp Seed Oil provides intense hydration for dry & dehydrated hair for smoothness and strength. 0% Artificial Colourants & Silicones

The BIO-TECH HYDRATE range with OLIVE SQUALANE, HEMP SEED OIL & HYALURONIC ACID treats the needs of dry and dehydrated hair, providing nourished and repaired hair full of moisture. BIO-TECH by Extra Care formulas with LIQUID KERATIN help repair existing damage and fortify the cell structure for future damage prevention.

WITH:
+ OLIVE SQUALANE
+ HEMP SEED OIL
+ HYALURONIC ACID
+ LIQUID KERATIN
+ APRICOT KERNEL OIL

NO:
- ARTIFICIAL COLOURANTS
- SILICONES
- MINERAL OILS
- TRIETHANOLAMINE

Made In Australia

100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details.

Suitable For: Dry, Dehydrated Hair

Size: 500mL

Hair Type: Dry, Dehydrated Hair

KEY FEATURES

• Intensively Hydrates, Moisturises & Smoothes Hair
• WITH:
+ OLIVE SQUALANE
+ HEMP SEED OIL
+ HYALURONIC ACID
+ LIQUID KERATIN
+ APRICOT KERNEL OIL
• NO:
- ARTIFICIAL COLOURANTS
- SILICONES
- MINERAL OILS
- TRIETHANOLAMINE
• 100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details

Warnings

Free from Artificial Colourants, Silicones, Mineral Oils, Triethanolamine

FLAMMABLE WARNING

No

Ingredients

Aqua (Water, Eau) · Cetearyl Alcohol · Quaternium-87 · Isopropyl Myristate · Propylene Glycol · Distearoylethyl Hydroxyethylmonium Methosulfate · Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine · Phenoxyethanol · Parfum (Fragrance) · Methylparaben · Polyquaternium-37· Dicaprylyl Carbonate · Citric Acid · Squalane · Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil · Panthenol · Cannabis Sativa Seed Oil · Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes · Hexyl Cinnamal · Hydrolyzed Keratin · Limonene · Hexyl Salicylate · Linalool · Lauryl Glucoside · Geraniol · Heliotropine ·Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone · Citronellol · Sodium Hyaluronate

Directions

Massage gently into wet hair after shampooing. Rinse thoroughly.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Bottle is Kerbside Recyclable, Cap can be recycled via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for details

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 1 PET(E)
